articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Benjamin Kiplagat: Ugandan athlete stabbed to death in Kenya - reports
articles.description: Benjamin Kiplagat, 34, reached the semi-finals of the 2012 London Olympics in the 3,000m steeplechase.
articles.content:
Benjamin Kiplagat, who has represented Uganda at three Olympic Games, has been found dead in Kenya, with local reports saying he had been stabbed.
Kiplagat, 34, reached the semi-finals of the 2012 L… [+345 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Macron says 2024, marked by Olympics, will be year of French pride and hope
articles.description: President Emmanuel Macron vowed on Sunday that 2024 will be the year of French pride and hope, marked by the Paris 2024 Olympic Summer Games and the re-opening of Notre-Dame cathedral after a devastating fire.
articles.content: PARIS, Dec 31 (Reuters) - President Emmanuel Macron vowed on Sunday that 2024 will be the year of French pride and hope, marked by the Paris 2024 Olympic Summer Games and the re-opening of Notre-Dame… [+978 chars]

articles.content:
